description: uplooking.tkedissipationrate: vertical profiles of turbulent dissipation rate in W/kg (= m^2 / s^3) beneath the wave-following free surface.
uplooking.z: depth bins, in meters, for the tke dissipation rate profiles
downlooking.velocityprofile: vertical profiles of horizontal velocity magnitude, in m/s, relative to the float (not corrected for drift)
downlooking.z: depth bins, in meters, for the velocity profiles
winddirT: true wind direction, in degrees FROM North
winddirTstddev: standard deviation of true wind direction, in degrees
windspd: wind speed, in m/s, at 1 m height above the wave-following surface
windspdstddev: standard deviation, in m/s, of wind speed
airtemp: air temperature, in deg C, at 1 m height above the wave-following surface
airtempstddev: standard deviation of air temperature, in deg C
sigwaveheight: significant wave height, in meters
peakwaveperiod: peak of period orbital velocity spectra (note convention is usually wave height spectrum)
peakwavedirT: wind direction, in degrees FROM North

wavespectra.energy: wave energy spectral density, in m^2/Hz, as a function of frequency.  Note that this is derived from orbital motions and is thus insensitive to low-energy swell conditions.  The technique is best suited to measuring short wind waves.
wavespectra.freq: spectral frequencies, in Hz
wavespectra.a1: normalized spectral directional moment (positive east)
wavespectra.b1: normalized spectral directional moment (positive north)
wavespectra.a2: normalized spectral directional moment (east-west)
wavespectra.b2: normalized spectral directional moment (north-south)
lat: latitude in decimal degrees
lon: longitude in decimal degrees
watertemp: water temperature, in deg C, at 0.5 m below the surface
salinity: water salinity, in PSU, at 0.5 m below the surface
puck: three color channels of a WetLabs puck flourometer
driftdirT: drift direction TOWARDS, in degrees True (equivalent to "course over ground")
dirftspd: drift speed in m/s (equivalent to "speed over ground")
z: reconstruction (via post-processing IMU data) of vertical displacements at 25 Hz
x: reconstruction (via post-processing IMU data) of horizontal east-west displacements at 25 Hz
y: reconstruction (via post-processing IMU data) of horizontal north-south displacements at 25 Hz
u: east-west GPS velocities at 4 Hz
v: north-south GPS velocities at 4 Hz
